subject: CMM Level 5 Opportunity
msgSnippet: Hi, We are a Software Executive Search company based in Mumbai. We are looking for professionals having expertise in UNIX(UNIX INTERNALS,UNIX NETWORK
messageBody:
Hi,

We are a Software Executive Search company based in Mumbai.

We are looking for professionals having expertise in UNIX(UNIX
INTERNALS,UNIX NETWORK PROGRAMMING),C,C++,LINUX
PROGRAMMING(QT,POSTGRESQL,MYSQL)for one of our reputed clients in
MUMBAI & BANGALORE.All are CMM Level 5 organizations.

The requirements are as follows.

Designation: Developer/Analyst
Experience:3-5yrs
Skills: C/C++/Unix(Unix Internals,Unix Network PRogramming)
Location: Mumbai,Bangalore


Designation: SSE
Experience:3-5yrs
Skills: Linux Programming(QT,PostgreSQL,MySQL,etc).
Location: Bangalore


Send us your recent CV to unixccpp_cnt@...


Thanks,
S.V.Rao.
ST Executive Search,
Mumbai.
